about_the_game:
Bee Hero Bug Blaster is a Looter Shooter with RPG elements where you annihilate hordes of bugs, level up, find epic loot, utilize a massive skill tree, create powerful builds, and fight colossal bosses.

                                     

Explore tons of powerful abilities that activate automatically on cooldown. From homing missiles and poison arrows to laser mines and ricochet blades, unleash devastating weapons like gas grenades, vampire fields, propeller bombs, and more. Create chaos with every cooldown.

                                    

The main weapon in your arsenal is incredibly versatile, with adjustable parameters such as bullet type, quantity, spread, fire rate, ricochet, and more. Want chaos? Add ricochet and extended bullet life to create a dazzling web of bouncing destruction. Prefer precision? Use twisting bullets to craft a deadly minefield. Creativity is your ultimate weapon!

                                   

Prepare for epic battles with mighty bosses such as the Black Widow, Mantis, Termite Queen, Centipede, Tarantula, and more. Each boss has unique behaviors, abilities, and attack patterns, turning every fight into a dynamic puzzle that challenges your reflexes and the strength of your build.

                                   

Dive into a massive skill tree with over ✨1,300 nodes, offering endless strategies and customization. Tailor your hero’s progression to match your playstyle, theorycraft unique builds, and forge a path to ultimate power.

                                   

Gems are procedurally generated items that enhance hero stats and skill tree nodes. Some gems even 💎REPLACE or ⭐MULTIPLY (x2, x3, x4...) nodes in the skill tree entirely, opening up limitless opportunities for experimentation and build crafting.

                                   

🔷Unique artstyle and insect theme 

🔶Simple, addictive, and challenging gameplay

🔷1300+ nodes skill tree. Nodes can be changed to other types or multiplied (x2, x3, x4...)

🔶Customizable weapon with dozens of stats and types of bullets that can be changed

🔷60+ automatic abilities

🔶100+ enemy types

🔷Dozens of Bosses featuring unique mechanics and attack patterns

🔶Procedurally-generated levels and items

🔷Fast runs (under 15 minutes)

🔶High replayability at any time
